meanings.definition: The remains of a building, city, etc., that has been destroyed or decayed.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins of the castle stood as a reminder of the past glory.
meanings.sent2: Tourists explored the ruins of the old temple, marveling at its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The ruins of the cake after the party were quickly devoured by hungry guests.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like ruins after the breakup, shattered into pieces.
meanings.sent5: The ruins of the shipwreck were visible from the shore, a haunting sight.

meanings.definition: To cause great destruction or damage to something.
meanings.sent1: The earthquake ruins many homes in the village, leaving families homeless.
meanings.sent2: Careless construction work ruins the foundation of the new building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy ruins the garden by digging up all the flowers.
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior ruins his chances of getting a promotion at work.
meanings.sent5: The storm ruins the picnic plans, forcing everyone to stay indoors.
